lead_paragraph: Under fire for a scandal in which employees set up sham accounts, the bank solidified its leadership structure under the chairman’s heir-apparent.

headline.print_headline: Wells Fargo Reshuffles Its Executive Ranks, Rallying Around the Bank’s No. 2
headline.main: Wells Fargo Reshuffles Top Ranks, Rallying Around Its No. 2

snippet: Under fire for a scandal in which employees set up sham accounts, the bank solidified its leadership structure under the chairman’s heir-apparent....
abstract: Well Fargo announces restructuring of its top management, placing number of high-level executives under wholesale banking division head Timothy J Sloan beginning in November; Sloan, whose division is largely insulated from bank's retail banking group scandal, is expected to eventually take over for embattled chief exec John G Stumpf.
